scripts.build: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.build-backend: cd src/backend && npm run build && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/backend/dist/* ./dist
scripts.build-frontend: cd src/frontend && npm run build && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/frontend/dist/* ./dist
scripts.publish-backend: cd src/backend && npm run publish && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/backend/dist/* ./dist
scripts.publish-frontend: cd src/frontend && npm run publish && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/frontend/dist/* ./dist
scripts.publish: npm run publish-backend && npm run publish-frontend
